title: Attack Of Heaven
description:
Description :
        “Warning: Mature content: This manga contains materials that might not be suitable to children under 17. By proceeding, you are confirming that you are 17 or older.”The Attack of Heaven was an ancient age-old tale told and passed downs for thousands of years. The legendary Immortal God Sword was on the verge of its history becoming lost in the annals of time by practitioners of the Central Plains. At the same time, a youth named Lin Yan, fostered and raised by a group of “women” in Yangchun Courtyard went on a journey full thorns and difficulties in search of his father. Along the way, he happened to meet his two life-long partners, the righteous Duanmu Hong and the cute but naive Dou Yi and thus begins the new tale of The Attack of Heaven.
